## 2.6 **重要的离散分布**

### 2.6.1 几何分布

#### 2.6.1.1 几何分布的定义

对于![n](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.395ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20600.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3En%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T89%20425T135%20442Q171%20442%20195%20424T225%20390T231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q304%20442%20382%20442Q436%20442%20469%20415T503%20336T465%20179T427%2052Q427%2026%20444%2026Q450%2026%20453%2027Q482%2032%20505%2065T540%20145Q542%20153%20560%20153Q580%20153%20580%20145Q580%20144%20576%20130Q568%20101%20554%2073T508%2017T439%20-10Q392%20-10%20371%2017T350%2073Q350%2092%20386%20193T423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20180T152%20343Q153%20348%20153%20366Q153%20405%20129%20405Q91%20405%2066%20305Q60%20285%2060%20284Q58%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)重伯努利实验，如果每次得到“是”的概率为![p](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.259ex%22%20height%3D%222.009ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.671ex%3B%20margin-left%3A%20-0.089ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%22-38.5%20-576.1%20542%20865.1%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20fo 其数学期望和方差为：

Var(X)=\frac{1-p}{p^2}](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%2230.987ex%22%20height%3D%226.009ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-2.505ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-1508.9%2013341.7%202587.3%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EE(X)%3D%5Cfrac%7B1%7D%7Bp%7D%2C%5Cquad%20Var(X)%3D%5Cfrac%7B1-p%7D%7Bp%5E2%7D%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-45%22%20d%3D%22M492%20213Q472%20213%20472%20226Q472%20230%20477%20250T482%20285Q482%20316%20461%20323T364%20330H312Q311%20328%20277%20192T243%2052Q243%2048%20254%2048T334%2046Q428%2046%20458%2048T518%2061Q567%2077%20599%20117T670%20248Q680%20270%20683%20272Q690%20274%20698%20274Q718%20274%20718%20261Q613%207%20608%202Q605%200%20322%200H133Q31%200%2031%2011Q31%2013%2034%2025Q38%2041%2042%2043T65%2046Q92%2046%20125%2049Q139%2052%20144%2061Q146%2066%20215%20342T285%20622Q285%20629%20281%20629Q273%20632%20228%20634H197Q191%20640%20191%20642T193%20659Q197%20676%20203%20680H757Q764%20676%20764%20669Q764%20664%20751%20557T737%20447Q735%20440%20717%20440H705Q698%20445%20698%20453L701%20476Q704%20500%20704%20528Q704%20558%20697%20578T678%20609T643%20625T596%20632T532%20634H485Q397%20633%20392%20631Q388%20629%20386%20622Q385%20619%20355%20499T324%20377Q347%20376%20372%20376H398Q464%20376%20489%20391T534%20472Q538%20488%20540%20490T557%20493Q562%20493%20565%20493T570%20492T572%20491T574%20487T577%20483L544%20351Q511%20218%20508%20216Q505%20213%20492%20213Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20d%3D%22M94%20250Q94%20319%20104%20381T127%20488T164%20576T202%20643T244%20695T277%20729T302%20750H315H319Q333%20750%20333%20741Q333%20738%20316%20720T275%20667T226%20581T184%20443T167%20250T1 #### 2.6.1.2 几何分布的无记忆性

假设梅累骑士和尼古拉斯抛掷骰子，谁先抛出6点谁获胜。由于谁先抛出6谁就获胜，所以这个问题很适合用几何分布。假设抛出6点的概率为![p](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.259ex%22%20height%3D%222.009ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.671ex%3B%20margin-left%3A%20-0.089ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%22-38.5%20-576.1%20542%20865.1%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Ep%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-70%22%20d%3D%22M23%20287Q24%20290%2025%20295T30%20317T40%20348T55%20381T75%20411T101%20433T134%20442Q209%20442%20230%20378L240%20387Q302%20442%20358%20442Q423%20442%20460%20395T497%20281Q497%20173%20421%2082T249%20-10Q227%20-10%20210%20-4Q199%201%20187%2011T168%2028L161%2036Q160%2035%20139%20-51T118%20-138Q118%20-144%20126%20-145T163%20-148H188Q194%20-155%20194%20-157T191%20-175Q188%20-187%20185%20-190T172%20-194Q170%20-194%20161%20-194T127%20-193T65%20-192Q-5%20-192%20-24%20-194H-32Q-39%20-187%20-39%20-183Q-37%20-156%20-26%20-148H-6Q28%20-147%2033%20-136Q36%20-130%2094%20103T155%20350Q156%20355%20156%20364Q156%20405%20131%20405Q109%20405%2094%20377T71%20316T59%20280Q57%20278%2043%20278H29Q23%20284%2023%20287ZM178%20102Q200%2026%20252%2026Q282%2026%20310%2049T356%20107Q374%20141%20392%20215T411%20325V331Q411%20405%20350%20405Q339%20405%20328%20402T306%20393T286%20380T269%20365T254%20350T243%20336T235%20326L232%20322Q232%20321%20229%20308T218%20264T204%20212Q178%20106%20178%20102Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-70%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)，那么有随机变量![X](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.98ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20852.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EX%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20d%3D%22M42%200H40Q26%200%2026%2011Q26%2015%2029%2027Q33%2041%2036%2043T55%2046Q141%2049%20190%2098Q200%20108%20306%20224T411%20342Q302%20620%20297%20625Q288%20636%20234%20637H206Q200%20643%20200%20645T202%20664Q206%20677%20212%20683H226Q260%20681%20347%20681Q380%20681%20408%20681T453%20682T473%20682Q490%20682%20490%20671Q490%20670%20488%20658Q484%20643%20481%20640T465%20637Q434%20634%20411%20620L488%20426L541%20485Q646%20598%20646%20610Q646%20628%20622%20635Q617%20635%20609%20637Q594%20637%20594%20648Q594%20650%20596%20664Q600%20677%20606%20683H618Q619%20683%20643%20683T697%20681T738%20680Q828%20680%20837%20683H845Q852%20676%20852%20672Q850%20647%20840%20637H824Q790%20636%20763%20628T722%20611T698%20593L687%20584Q687%20585%20592%20480L505%20384Q505%20383%20536%20304T601%20142T638%2056Q648%2047%20699%2046Q734%2046%20734%2037Q734%2035%20732%2023Q728%207%20725%204T711%201Q708%201%20678%201T589%202Q528%202%20496%202T461%201Q444%201%20444%2010Q444%2011%20446%2025Q448%2035%20450%2039T455%2044T464%2046T480%2047T506%2054Q523%2062%20523%2064Q522%2064%20476%20181L429%20299Q241%2095%20236%2084Q232%2076%20232%2072Q232%2053%20261%2047Q262%2047%20267%2047T273%2046Q276%2046%20277%2046T280%2045T283%2042T284%2035Q284%2026%20282%2019Q279%206%20276%204T261%201Q258%201%20243%201T201%202T142%202Q64%202%2042%200Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220% %3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)把都没有抛出6点，所以对应概率为：

m)=\sum_{k=m+1}^{\infty}(1-p)^{k-1}p=\frac{p(1-p)^m}{1-(1-p)}=(1-p)^m](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%2257.465ex%22%20height%3D%227.009ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-3.171ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-1652.5%2024741.7%203017.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0AP(X%20%26gt%3B%20m)%3D%5Csum_%7Bk%3Dm%2B1%7D%5E%7B%5Cinfty%7D(1-p)%5E%7Bk-1%7Dp%3D%5Cfrac%7Bp(1-p)%5Em%7D%7B1-(1-p)%7D%3D(1-p)%5Em%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-50%22%20d%3D%22M287%20628Q287%20635%20230%20637Q206%20637%20199%20638T192%20648Q192%20649%20194%20659Q200%20679%20203%20681T397%20683Q587%20682%20600%20680Q664%20669%20707%20631T751%20530Q751%20453%20685%20389Q616%20321%20507%20303Q500%20302%20402%20301H307L277%20182Q247%2066%20247%2059Q247%2055%20248%2054T255%2050T272%2048T305%2046H336Q342%2037%20342%2035Q342%2019%20335%205Q330%200%20319%200Q316%200%20282%201T182%202Q120%202%2087%202T51%201Q33%201%2033%2011Q33%2013%2036%2025Q40%2041%2044%2043T67%2046Q94%2046%20127%2049Q141%2052%20146%2061Q149%2065%20218%20339T287%20628ZM645%20554Q645%20567%20643%20575T634%20597T609%20619T560%20635Q553%20636%20480%20637Q463%20637%20445%20637T416%20636T404%20636Q391%20635%20386%20627Q384%20621%20367%20550T332%20412T314%20344Q314%20342%20395%20342H407H430Q542%20342%20590%20392Q617%20419%20631%20471T645%20554Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20d%3D%22M94%20250Q94%20319%20104%20381T127%20488T164%20576T202%20643T244%20695T277%20729T302%20750H315H319Q333%20750%20333%20741Q333%20738%20316%20720T275%20667T226%20581T184%20443T167%20250T184%2058T225%20-81T274%20-167T316%20-220T333%20-241Q333%20-250%20318%20-250H315H302L274%20-226Q180%20-141%2 在梅累骑士连抛![m](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%222.04ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20878.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Em%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T88%20425T132%20442T175%20435T205%20417T221%20395T229%20376L231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q303%20442%20384%20442Q401%20442%20415%20440T441%20433T460%20423T475%20411T485%20398T493%20385T497%20373T500%20364T502%20357L510%20367Q573%20442%20659%20442Q713%20442%20746%20415T780%20336Q780%20285%20742%20178T704%2050Q705%2036%20709%2031T724%2026Q752%2026%20776%2056T815%20138Q818%20149%20821%20151T837%20153Q857%20153%20857%20145Q857%20144%20853%20130Q845%20101%20831%2073T785%2017T716%20-10Q669%20-10%20648%2017T627%2073Q627%2092%20663%20193T700%20345Q700%20404%20656%20404H651Q565%20404%20506%20303L499%20291L466%20157Q433%2026%20428%2016Q415%20-11%20385%20-11Q372%20-11%20364%20-4T353%208T350%2018Q350%2029%20384%20161L420%20307Q423%20322%20423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20181Q151%20335%20151%20342Q154%20357%20154%20369Q154%20405%20129%20405Q107%20405%2092%20377T69%20316T57%20280Q55%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)把都没有抛出6点的条件下，尼古拉斯接着抛了![n](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.395ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20600.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3En%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T89%20425T135%20442Q171%20442%20195%20424T225%20390T231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q304%20442%20382%20442Q436%20442%20469%20415T503%20336T465%20179T427%2052Q427%2026%20444%2026Q450%2026%20453%2027Q482%2032%20505%2065T540%20145Q542%20153%20560%20153Q580%20153%20580%20145Q580%20144%20576%20130Q568%20101%20554%2073T508%2017T439%20-10Q392%20-10%20371%2017T350%2073Q350%2092%20386%20193T423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20180T152%20343Q153%20348%20153%20366Q153%20405%20129%20405Q91%20405%2066%20305Q60%20285%2060%20284Q58%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)把，就抛出6点的概率为（这是一个条件概率）：

![ \begin{aligned}     P(X=m+n|X > m)         &=\frac{P(X=m+n)}{P(X > m)}=\frac{(1-p)^{m+n-1}p}{(1-p)^m}\\         \\         &=(1-p)^{n-1}p=P(X=n) \end{aligned} 可以看到，梅累骑士连抛![m](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%222.04ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20878.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Em%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T88%20425T132%20442T175%20435T205%20417T221%20395T229%20376L231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q303%20442%20384%20442Q401%20442%20415%20440T441%20433T460%20423T475%20411T485%20398T493%20385T497%20373T500%20364T502%20357L510%20367Q573%20442%20659%20442Q713%20442%20746%20415T780%20336Q780%20285%20742%20178T704%2050Q705%2036%20709%2031T724%2026Q752%2026%20776%2056T815%20138Q818%20149%20821%20151T837%20153Q857%20153%20857%20145Q857%20144%20853%20130Q845%20101%20831%2073T785%2017T716%20-10Q669%20-10%20648%2017T627%2073Q627%2092%20663%20193T700%20345Q700%20404%20656%20404H651Q565%20404%20506%20303L499%20291L466%20157Q433%2026%20428%2016Q415%20-11%20385%20-11Q372%20-11%20364%20-4T353%208T350%2018Q350%2029%20384%20161L420%20307Q423%20322%20423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20181Q151%20335%20151%20342Q154%20357%20154%20369Q154%20405%20129%20405Q107%20405%2092%20377T69%20316T57%20280Q55%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C% 数学家把这种特性形象地称作![\color{Salmon}{几何分布的无记忆性}](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%2216.25ex%22%20height%3D%222.843ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-1.005ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%206996.5%201223.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%5Ccolor%7BSalmon%7D%7B%E5%87%A0%E4%BD%95%E5%88%86%E5%B8%83%E7%9A%84%E6%97%A0%E8%AE%B0%E5%BF%86%E6%80%A7%7D%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22monospace%22%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20transform%3D%22scale(59.79916666666667)%20matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%3E%E5%87%A0%3C%2Ftext%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%20transform%3D%22translate(777%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22monospace%22%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20transform%3D%22scale(59.79916666666667)%20matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%3E%E4%BD%95%3C%2Ftext%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%20transform%3D%22translate(1554%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22monospace%22%20stroke%3D%2 22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22monospace%22%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20transform%3D%22scale(59.79916666666667)%20matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%3E%E5%BF%86%3C%2Ftext%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%20transform%3D%22translate(6219%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22monospace%22%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20transform%3D%22scale(59.79916666666667)%20matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%3E%E6%80%A7%3C%2Ftext%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)，只要期待的“是”没有出现，那么几何分布就仿佛不记得之前发生的事件。值得注意的是在离散分布中只有几何分布具有此特性。



### 2.6.2 负二项分布

每次飞行之后，都要对飞机进行检查，其中一非关键的易损件，每次飞行后都有![p](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.259ex%22%20height%3D%222.009ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.671ex%3B%20margin-left%3A%20-0.089ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%22-38.5%20-576.1%20542%20865.1%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Ep%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-70%22%20d%3D%22M23%20287Q24%20290%2025%20295T30%20317T40%20348T55%20381T75%20411T101%20433T134%20442Q209%20442%20230%20378L240%20387Q302%20442%20358%20442Q423%20442%20460%20395T497%20281Q497%20173%20421%2082T249%20-10Q227%20-10%20210%20-4Q199%201%20187%2011T168%2028L161%2036Q160%2035%20139%20-51T118%20-138Q118%20-144%20126%20-145T163%20-148H188Q194%20-155%20194%20-157T191%20-175Q188%20-187%20185%20-190T172%20-194Q170%20-194%20161%20-194T127%20-193T65%20-192Q-5%20-192%20-24%20-194H-32Q-39%20-187%20-39%20-183Q-37%20-156%20-26%20-148H-6Q28%20-147%2033%20-136Q36%20-130%2094%20103T155%20350Q156%20355%20156%20364Q156%20405%20131%20405Q109%20405%2094%20377T71%20316T59%20280Q57%20278%2043%20278H29Q23%20284%2023%20287ZM178%20102Q200%2026%20252%2026Q282%2026%20310%2049T356%20107Q374%20141%20392%20215T411%20325V331Q411%20405%20350%20405Q339%20405%20328%20402T306%20393T286%20380T269%20365T254%20350T243%20336T235%20326L232%20322Q232%20321%20229%20308T218%20264T204%20212Q178%20106%20178%20102Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-70%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)的概率损坏。本着节约成本的原则，规定可以修理，但损坏![r](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.049ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20451.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Er%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-72%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20290%2023%20295T28%20317T38%20348T53%20381T73%20411T99%20433T132%20442Q161%20442%20183%20430T214%20408T225%20388Q227%20382%20228%20382T236%20389Q284%20441%20347%20441H350Q398%20441%20422%20400Q430%20381%20430%20363Q430%20333%20417%20315T391%20292T366%20288Q346%20288%20334%20299T322%20328Q322%20376%20378%20392Q356%20405%20342%20405Q286%20405%20239%20331Q229%20315%20224%20298T190%20165Q156%2025%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20114%20189T154%20366Q154%20405%20128%20405Q107%20405%2092%20377T68%20316T57%20280Q55%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-72%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)次后必须报废更换。问，第![k](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.211ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20521.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Ek%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20ari 假设随机变量为：

![X=第k次飞行，零件正好损坏r次](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%2229.005ex%22%20height%3D%222.843ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-1.005ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%2012488.2%201223.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EX%3D%E7%AC%ACk%E6%AC%A1%E9%A3%9E%E8%A1%8C%EF%BC%8C%E9%9B%B6%E4%BB%B6%E6%AD%A3%E5%A5%BD%E6%8D%9F%E5%9D%8Fr%E6%AC%A1%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20d%3D%22M42%200H40Q26%200%2026%2011Q26%2015%2029%2027Q33%2041%2036%2043T55%2046Q141%2049%20190%2098Q200%20108%20306%20224T411%20342Q302%20620%20297%20625Q288%20636%20234%20637H206Q200%20643%20200%20645T202%20664Q206%20677%20212%20683H226Q260%20681%20347%20681Q380%20681%20408%20681T453%20682T473%20682Q490%20682%20490%20671Q490%20670%20488%20658Q484%20643%20481%20640T465%20637Q434%20634%20411%20620L488%20426L541%20485Q646%20598%20646%20610Q646%20628%20622%20635Q617%20635%20609%20637Q594%20637%20594%20648Q594%20650%20596%20664Q600%20677%20606%20683H618Q619%20683%20643%20683T697%20681T738%20680Q828%20680%20837%20683H845Q852%20676%20852%20672Q850%20647%20840%20637H824Q790%20636%20763%20628T722%20611T698%20593L687%20584Q687%20585%20592%20480L505%20384Q505%20383%20536%20304T601%20142T638%2056Q648%2047%20699%2046Q734%2046%20734%2037Q734%2035%20732%2023Q728%207%20725%204T711%201Q708%201%20678%201T589%202Q528%202%20496%202T461%201Q444%201%20444%2010Q444%2011%20446%2025Q448%2035%20450%2039T455%2044T464%2046T480%2047T506%2054Q523%2062%20523%2064Q522%2064%20476%20181L429%20299Q241%2095%20236%2084Q232%2076%20232%2072Q232%2053%20261%2047Q262%2047%20267%2047T273%2046Q276%2046%20277%2046T280%2045T283%2042T284%2035Q284%2026%20282%2019Q279%206%20276%204T261%201Q258%201%20243%201T201%202T142%202 然后第![k](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.211ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20521.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Ek%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6B%22%20d%3D%22M121%20647Q121%20657%20125%20670T137%20683Q138%20683%20209%20688T282%20694Q294%20694%20294%20686Q294%20679%20244%20477Q194%20279%20194%20272Q213%20282%20223%20291Q247%20309%20292%20354T362%20415Q402%20442%20438%20442Q468%20442%20485%20423T503%20369Q503%20344%20496%20327T477%20302T456%20291T438%20288Q418%20288%20406%20299T394%20328Q394%20353%20410%20369T442%20390L458%20393Q446%20405%20434%20405H430Q398%20402%20367%20380T294%20316T228%20255Q230%20254%20243%20252T267%20246T293%20238T320%20224T342%20206T359%20180T365%20147Q365%20130%20360%20106T354%2066Q354%2026%20381%2026Q429%2026%20459%20145Q461%20153%20479%20153H483Q499%20153%20499%20144Q499%20139%20496%20130Q455%20-11%20378%20-11Q333%20-11%20305%2015T277%2090Q277%20108%20280%20121T283%20145Q283%20167%20269%20183T234%20206T200%20217T182%20220H180Q168%20178%20159%20139T145%2081T136%2044T129%2020T122%207T111%20-2Q98%20-11%2083%20-11Q66%20-11%2057%20-1T48%2016Q48%2026%2085%20176T158%20471L195%20616Q196%20629%20188%20632T149%20637H144Q134%20637%20131%20637T124%20640T121%20647Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6B%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)次飞行，此零件必须要损坏，所以所求概率为：

#### 2.6.2.1 负二项分布的定义

对于![n](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.395ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20600.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3En%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T89%20425T135%20442Q171%20442%20195%20424T225%20390T231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q304%20442%20382%20442Q436%20442%20469%20415T503%20336T465%20179T427%2052Q427%2026%20444%2026Q450%2026%20453%2027Q482%2032%20505%2065T540%20145Q542%20153%20560%20153Q580%20153%20580%20145Q580%20144%20576%20130Q568%20101%20554%2073T508%2017T439%20-10Q392%20-10%20371%2017T350%2073Q350%2092%20386%20193T423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20180T152%20343Q153%20348%20153%20366Q153%20405%20129%20405Q91%20405%2066%20305Q60%20285%2060%20284Q58%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)重伯努利实验，如果每次得到“是”的概率为![p](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.259ex%22%20height%3D%222.009ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.671ex%3B%20margin-left%3A%20-0.089ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%22-38.5%20-576.1%20542%20865.1%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20fo #### 2.6.2.2 负二项分布与几何分布的关系

**1 几何是负二项的特例**

负二项分布是这样的：

**2 负二项是几何的和**

所以负二项分布的期望为：

![E(X)=E(X_1)+E(X_2)+\cdots+E(X_r)=\frac{r}{p}](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%2244.622ex%22%20height%3D%225.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-2.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-1221.9%2019212%202228.5%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EE(X)%3DE(X_1)%2BE(X_2)%2B%5Ccdots%2BE(X_r)%3D%5Cfrac%7Br%7D%7Bp%7D%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-45%22%20d%3D%22M492%20213Q472%20213%20472%20226Q472%20230%20477%20250T482%20285Q482%20316%20461%20323T364%20330H312Q311%20328%20277%20192T243%2052Q243%2048%20254%2048T334%2046Q428%2046%20458%2048T518%2061Q567%2077%20599%20117T670%20248Q680%20270%20683%20272Q690%20274%20698%20274Q718%20274%20718%20261Q613%207%20608%202Q605%200%20322%200H133Q31%200%2031%2011Q31%2013%2034%2025Q38%2041%2042%2043T65%2046Q92%2046%20125%2049Q139%2052%20144%2061Q146%2066%20215%20342T285%20622Q285%20629%20281%20629Q273%20632%20228%20634H197Q191%20640%20191%20642T193%20659Q197%20676%20203%20680H757Q764%20676%20764%20669Q764%20664%20751%20557T737%20447Q735%20440%20717%20440H705Q698%20445%20698%20453L701%20476Q704%20500%20704%20528Q704%20558%20697%20578T678%20609T643%20625T596%20632T532%20634H485Q397%20633%20392%20631Q388%20629%20386%20622Q385%20619%20355%20499T324%20377Q347%20376%20372%20376H398Q464%20376%20489%20391T534%20472Q538%20488%20540%20490T557%20493Q562%20493%20565%20493T570%20492T572%20491T574%20487T577%20483L544%20351Q511%20218%20508%20216Q505%20213%20492%20213Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20d%3D%22M94%20250Q94%20319%20104%20381T127%20488T164%20576T202%20643T244%20695T277%20729T302%20750H315H319Q333%20750%20333%20741Q333%20738%20316%20720T275%20667T226%20581T184%20443T ### 2.6.3 超几何分布

#### 2.6.3.1 超几何分布的定义

设有![N](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%222.064ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20888.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EN%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20d%3D%22M234%20637Q231%20637%20226%20637Q201%20637%20196%20638T191%20649Q191%20676%20202%20682Q204%20683%20299%20683Q376%20683%20387%20683T401%20677Q612%20181%20616%20168L670%20381Q723%20592%20723%20606Q723%20633%20659%20637Q635%20637%20635%20648Q635%20650%20637%20660Q641%20676%20643%20679T653%20683Q656%20683%20684%20682T767%20680Q817%20680%20843%20681T873%20682Q888%20682%20888%20672Q888%20650%20880%20642Q878%20637%20858%20637Q787%20633%20769%20597L620%207Q618%200%20599%200Q585%200%20582%202Q579%205%20453%20305L326%20604L261%20344Q196%2088%20196%2079Q201%2046%20268%2046H278Q284%2041%20284%2038T282%2019Q278%206%20272%200H259Q228%202%20151%202Q123%202%20100%202T63%202T46%201Q31%201%2031%2010Q31%2014%2034%2026T39%2040Q41%2046%2062%2046Q130%2049%20150%2085Q154%2091%20221%20362L289%20634Q287%20635%20234%20637Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)件产品，其中有![M](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%222.442ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%201051.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22 假设随机变量：

然后有![m](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%222.04ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20878.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Em%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T88%20425T132%20442T175%20435T205%20417T221%20395T229%20376L231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q303%20442%20384%20442Q401%20442%20415%20440T441%20433T460%20423T475%20411T485%20398T493%20385T497%20373T500%20364T502%20357L510%20367Q573%20442%20659%20442Q713%20442%20746%20415T780%20336Q780%20285%20742%20178T704%2050Q705%2036%20709%2031T724%2026Q752%2026%20776%2056T815%20138Q818%20149%20821%20151T837%20153Q857%20153%20857%20145Q857%20144%20853%20130Q845%20101%20831%2073T785%2017T716%20-10Q669%20-10%20648%2017T627%2073Q627%2092%20663%20193T700%20345Q700%20404%20656%20404H651Q565%20404%20506%20303L499%20291L466%20157Q433%2026%20428%2016Q415%20-11%20385%20-11Q372%20-11%20364%20-4T353%208T350%2018Q350%2029%20384%20161L420%20307Q423%20322%20423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20181Q151%20335%20151%20342Q154%20357%20154%20369Q154%20405%20129%20405Q107%20405%2092%20377T69%20316T57%20280Q55%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(12503%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(120%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Crect%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20width%3D%221171%22%20height%3D%2260%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%22220%22%3E%3C%2Frect%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4D%22%20x%3D%2260%22%20y%3D%22676%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20x%3D%22141%22%20y%3D%22-704%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(13915%2C0)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJSZ3-28%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-31%22%20x%3D%22736%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2212%22%20x%3D%221459%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(2237%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(342%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Crect%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20width%3D%221171%22%20height%3D%2260%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%22220%22%3E%3C%2Frect%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4D%22%20x%3D%2260%22%20y%3D%22676%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20x%3D%22141%22%20y%3D%22-704%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJSZ3-29%22%20x%3D%223871%22%20y%3D%22-1%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(18689%2C0)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJSZ3-28%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-31%22%20x%3D%22736%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2212%22%20x%3D%221459%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(2237%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(342%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Crect%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20width%3D%222731%22%20height%3D%2260%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%22220%22%3E%3C%2Frect%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(204%2C676)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2212%22%20x%3D%22822%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-31%22%20x%3D%221823%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(60%2C-704)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2212%22%20x%3D%221110%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-31%22%20x%3D%222111%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJSZ3-29%22%20x%3D%225431%22%20y%3D%22-1%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)



#### 2.6.3.2 超几何分布与二项分布

超几何分布与二项分布类似，都是求抽取![n](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.395ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20600.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3En%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T89%20425T135%20442Q171%20442%20195%20424T225%20390T231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q304%20442%20382%20442Q436%20442%20469%20415T503%20336T465%20179T427%2052Q427%2026%20444%2026Q450%2026%20453%2027Q482%2032%20505%2065T540%20145Q542%20153%20560%20153Q580%20153%20580%20145Q580%20144%20576%20130Q568%20101%20554%2073T508%2017T439%20-10Q392%20-10%20371%2017T350%2073Q350%2092%20386%20193T423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20180T152%20343Q153%20348%20153%20366Q153%20405%20129%20405Q91%20405%2066%20305Q60%20285%2060%20284Q58%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)次其中有![m](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%222.04ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20878.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Em%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T88%20425T132%20442T175%20435T205%20417T221%20395T229%20376L231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q303%20442%20384%20442Q401%20442%20415%20440T441%20433T460%20423T475%20411T485%20398T493%20385T497%20373T500%20364T502%20357L510%20367Q573%20442%20659%20442Q713%20442%20746%20415T780%20336Q780%20285%20742%20178T704%2050Q705%2036%20709%2031T724%2026Q752%2026%20776%2056T815%20138Q818%20149%20821%20151T837%20153Q857%20153%20857%20145Q857%20144%20853%20130Q845%20101%20831%2073T785%2017T716%20-10Q669%20-10%20648%2017T627%2073Q627%2092%20663%20193T700%20345Q700%20404%20656%20404H651Q565%20404%20506%20303L499%20291L466%20157Q433%2026%20428%2016Q415%20-11%20385%20-11Q372%20-11%20364%20-4T353%208T350%2018Q350%2029%20384%20161L420%20307Q423%20322%20423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20181Q151%20335%20151%20342Q154%20357%20154%20369Q154%20405%20129%20405Q107%20405%2092%20377T69%20316T57%20280Q55%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)次“是”的概率，只是：

- 二项分布：相当于抽取之后放回
- 超几何分布：抽取之后不放回

所以在超几何分布中，如果被抽取的总数![N](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%222.064ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20888.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EN%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20d%3D%22M234%20637Q231%20637%20226%20637Q201%20637%20196%20638T191%20649Q191%20676%20202%20682Q204%20683%20299%20683Q376%20683%20387%20683T401%20677Q612%20181%20616%20168L670%20381Q723%20592%20723%20606Q723%20633%20659%20637Q635%20637%20635%20648Q635%20650%20637%20660Q641%20676%20643%20679T653%20683Q656%20683%20684%20682T767%20680Q817%20680%20843%20681T873%20682Q888%20682%20888%20672Q888%20650%20880%20642Q878%20637%20858%20637Q787%20633%20769%20597L620%207Q618%200%20599%200Q585%200%20582%202Q579%205%20453%20305L326%20604L261%20344Q196%2088%20196%2079Q201%2046%20268%2046H278Q284%2041%20284%2038T282%2019Q278%206%20272%200H259Q228%202%20151%202Q123%202%20100%202T63%202T46%201Q31%201%2031%2010Q31%2014%2034%2026T39%2040Q41%2046%2062%2046Q130%2049%20150%2085Q154%2091%20221%20362L289%20634Q287%20635%20234%20637Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)特别大，那么放回不放回区别也就不大了，此时，那么超几何分布可以近似看作二项分布。

这点从两者的期望、方差也可以看出来：![ \begin{array}{c|c}     &\qquad 二项分布\qquad&\qquad 超几何分布\qquad\\     \hline     \\     \quad \mu\quad& np & n\frac{M}{N} \\     \\     \hline      \\     \quad \sigma\quad& np(1-p) & n\frac{M}{N}\left(1-\frac{M}{N}\right)\left(1-\frac{n-1}{N-1}\right)\\     \\ \end{array} 对超几何分布而言，当![N](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%222.064ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20888.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EN%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20d%3D%22M234%20637Q231%20637%20226%20637Q201%20637%20196%20638T191%20649Q191%20676%20202%20682Q204%20683%20299%20683Q376%20683%20387%20683T401%20677Q612%20181%20616%20168L670%20381Q723%20592%20723%20606Q723%20633%20659%20637Q635%20637%20635%20648Q635%20650%20637%20660Q641%20676%20643%20679T653%20683Q656%20683%20684%20682T767%20680Q817%20680%20843%20681T873%20682Q888%20682%20888%20672Q888%20650%20880%20642Q878%20637%20858%20637Q787%20633%20769%20597L620%207Q618%200%20599%200Q585%200%20582%202Q579%205%20453%20305L326%20604L261%20344Q196%2088%20196%2079Q201%2046%20268%2046H278Q284%2041%20284%2038T282%2019Q278%206%20272%200H259Q228%202%20151%202Q123%202%20100%202T63%202T46%201Q31%201%2031%2010Q31%2014%2034%2026T39%2040Q41%2046%2062%2046Q130%2049%20150%2085Q154%2091%20221%20362L289%20634Q287%20635%20234%20637Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)足够大的时候，![\frac{M}{N}](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%223.278ex%22%20height%3D%225.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-1.838ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-1437.2%201411.5%202228.5%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%5Cfrac%7BM%7D%7BN%7D%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-4D%22%20d%3D%22M289%20629Q289%20635%20232%20637Q208%20637%20201%20638T194%20648Q194%20649%20196%20659Q197%20662%20198%20666T199%20671T201%20676T203%20679T207%20681T212%20683T220%20683T232%20684Q238%20684%20262%20684T307%20683Q386%20683%20398%20683T414%20678Q415%20674%20451%20396L487%20117L510%20154Q534%20190%20574%20254T662%20394Q837%20673%20839%20675Q840%20676%20842%20678T846%20681L852%20683H948Q965%20683%20988%20683T1017%20684Q1051%20684%201051%20673Q1051%20668%201048%20656T1045%20643Q1041%20637%201008%20637Q968%20636%20957%20634T939%20623Q936%20618%20867%20340T797%2059Q797%2055%20798%2054T805%2050T822%2048T855%2046H886Q892%2037%20892%2035Q892%2019%20885%205Q880%200%20869%200Q864%200%20828%201T736%202Q675%202%20644%202T609%201Q592%201%20592%2011Q592%2013%20594%2025Q598%2041%20602%2043T625%2046Q652%2046%20685%2049Q699%2052%20704%2061Q706%2065%20742%20207T813%20490T848%20631L654%20322Q458%2010%20453%205Q451%204%20449%203Q444%200%20433%200Q418%200%20415%207Q413%2011%20374%20317L335%20624L267%20354Q200%2088%20200%2079Q206%2046%20272%2046H282Q288%2041%20289%2037T286%2019Q282%203%20278%201Q274%200%20267%200Q265%200%20255%200T221%201T157%202Q127%202%2095%201T58%200Q43%200%2039%202T35%2011Q35%2013%2038%2025T43%2040Q45%2046%2065%2046Q135%2046%20154%2086Q158%2092%20223%20354T289%20629Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20d%3D%22M234%20637Q231%20637%20226%20637Q201%20637%20196%20638T191%20649Q191%20676%20202%20682Q204%20683%20299%20683Q376%20683%20387%20683T401%20677Q612%20181%20616%20168L670%20381Q723%20592%20723%20606Q723%20633%20659%20637Q635%20637%20635%20648Q635%20650%20637%20660Q641%20676%20643%20679T653%20683Q656%20683%20684%20682T767%20680Q817%20680%20843%20681T873%20682Q888%20682%20888%20672Q888%20650%20880%20642Q878%20637%20858%20637Q787%20633%20769%20597L620%207Q618%200%20599%200Q585%200%20582%202Q579%205%20453%20305L326%20604L261%20344Q196%2088%20196%2079Q201%2046%20268%2046H278Q284%2041%20284%2038T282%2019Q278%206%20272%200H259Q228%202%20151%202Q123%202%20100%202T63%202T46%201Q31%201%2031%2010Q31%2014%2034%2026T39%2040Q41%2046%2062%2046Q130%2049%20150%2085Q154%2091%20221%20362L289%20634Q287%20635%20234%20637Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(120%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Crect%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20width%3D%221171%22%20height%3D%2260%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%22220%22%3E%3C%2Frect%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4D%22%20x%3D%2260%22%20y%3D%22676%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4E%22%20x%3D%22141%22%20y%3D%22-704%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)可看作取出不合格产品的概率，那此时超几何分布可看作二项分布。



## 2.7 离散分布的总结

![ \begin{array}{c|c}     \hline     \\     \quad 伯努利分布\quad&\quad 抛硬币，二选一 \quad\\      \quad 二项分布\quad&\quad n重伯努利，出现k次“是” \quad\\      \quad 泊松分布\quad&\quad 二项分布的极限 \quad\\      \quad 几何分布\quad&\quad n重伯努利，第k次首次出现“是” \quad\\      \quad 负二项分布\quad&\quad 几何分布的和 \quad\\      \quad 超几何分布\quad&\quad 不放回抽样的二项分布 \quad\\      \\     \hline \end{array} ## 2.8 连续分布的概率密度函数

### 2.8.1 概率密度函数严格定义

如果函数![p(x)](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%224.398ex%22%20height%3D%222.843ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%20margin-left%3A%20-0.089ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%22-38.5%20-863.1%201893.5%201223.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Ep(x)%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-70%22%20d%3D%22M23%20287Q24%20290%2025%20295T30%20317T40%20348T55%20381T75%20411T101%20433T134%20442Q209%20442%20230%20378L240%20387Q302%20442%20358%20442Q423%20442%20460%20395T497%20281Q497%20173%20421%2082T249%20-10Q227%20-10%20210%20-4Q199%201%20187%2011T168%2028L161%2036Q160%2035%20139%20-51T118%20-138Q118%20-144%20126%20-145T163%20-148H188Q194%20-155%20194%20-157T191%20-175Q188%20-187%20185%20-190T172%20-194Q170%20-194%20161%20-194T127%20-193T65%20-192Q-5%20-192%20-24%20-194H-32Q-39%20-187%20-39%20-183Q-37%20-156%20-26%20-148H-6Q28%20-147%2033%20-136Q36%20-130%2094%20103T155%20350Q156%20355%20156%20364Q156%20405%20131%20405Q109%20405%2094%20377T71%20316T59%20280Q57%20278%2043%20278H29Q23%20284%2023%20287ZM178%20102Q200%2026%20252%2026Q282%2026%20310%2049T356%20107Q374%20141%20392%20215T411%20325V331Q411%20405%20350%20405Q339%20405%20328%20402T306%20393T286%20380T269%20365T254%20350T243%20336T235%20326L232%20322Q232%20321%20229%20308T218%20264T204%20212Q178%20106%20178%20102Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20d%3D%22M94%20250Q94%20319%20104%20381T127%20488T164%20576T202%20643T244%20695T277%20729T302%20750H315H319Q333%20750%20333%20741Q333%20738%20316%20720T275%20667T226%20581T184%20443T167%20250T184%2058T225%20-81T274%20-167T316%20-220T333%20-241Q333%20-250%20318%20-250H315H302L274%20-226Q180%20-141%20137%20-14T94% 3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)满足下列两个条件（对应了概率的三大公理）：

- **非负性**：

  ![p(x) \ge 0](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%228.659ex%22%20height%3D%222.843ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%20margin-left%3A%20-0.089ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%22-38.5%20-863.1%203728.1%201223.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Ep(x)%20%5Cge%200%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-70%22%20d%3D%22M23%20287Q24%20290%2025%20295T30%20317T40%20348T55%20381T75%20411T101%20433T134%20442Q209%20442%20230%20378L240%20387Q302%20442%20358%20442Q423%20442%20460%20395T497%20281Q497%20173%20421%2082T249%20-10Q227%20-10%20210%20-4Q199%201%20187%2011T168%2028L161%2036Q160%2035%20139%20-51T118%20-138Q118%20-144%20126%20-145T163%20-148H188Q194%20-155%20194%20-157T191%20-175Q188%20-187%20185%20-190T172%20-194Q170%20-194%20161%20-194T127%20-193T65%20-192Q-5%20-192%20-24%20-194H-32Q-39%20-187%20-39%20-183Q-37%20-156%20-26%20-148H-6Q28%20-147%2033%20-136Q36%20-130%2094%20103T155%20350Q156%20355%20156%20364Q156%20405%20131%20405Q109%20405%2094%20377T71%20316T59%20280Q57%20278%2043%20278H29Q23%20284%2023%20287ZM178%20102Q200%2026%20252%2026Q282%2026%20310%2049T356%20107Q374%20141%20392%20215T411%20325V331Q411%20405%20350%20405Q339%20405%20328%20402T306%20393T286%20380T269%20365T254%20350T243%20336T235%20326L232%20322Q232%20321%20229%20308T218%20264T204%20212Q178%20106%20178%20102Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20d%3D%22M94%20250Q94%20319%20104%20381T127%20488T164%20576T202%20643T244%20695T277%20729T302%20750H315H319Q333%20750%20333%20741Q333%20738%20316%20720T275%20667T226%20581T184%20443T167%20250T184%2058T225%20-81T274%20-167T316%20-220T333%20-241Q333%20-250%20318%20-250H315H302L274%20-226Q180%20-141%20137%20-14T - **规范性**（暗含了可加性），因为是连续的，所以通过积分相加：

Density Function，简写为PDF）。



### 2.8.2 连续的累积分布函数

#### 2.8.2.1 连续的累积分布函数的定义

连续随机变量![X](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.98ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20852.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EX%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20d%3D%22M42%200H40Q26%200%2026%2011Q26%2015%2029%2027Q33%2041%2036%2043T55%2046Q141%2049%20190%2098Q200%20108%20306%20224T411%20342Q302%20620%20297%20625Q288%20636%20234%20637H206Q200%20643%20200%20645T202%20664Q206%20677%20212%20683H226Q260%20681%20347%20681Q380%20681%20408%20681T453%20682T473%20682Q490%20682%20490%20671Q490%20670%20488%20658Q484%20643%20481%20640T465%20637Q434%20634%20411%20620L488%20426L541%20485Q646%20598%20646%20610Q646%20628%20622%20635Q617%20635%20609%20637Q594%20637%20594%20648Q594%20650%20596%20664Q600%20677%20606%20683H618Q619%20683%20643%20683T697%20681T738%20680Q828%20680%20837%20683H845Q852%20676%20852%20672Q850%20647%20840%20637H824Q790%20636%20763%20628T722%20611T698%20593L687%20584Q687%20585%20592%20480L505%20384Q505%20383%20536%20304T601%20142T638%2056Q648%2047%20699%2046Q734%2046%20734%2037Q734%2035%20732%2023Q728%207%20725%204T711%201Q708%201%20678%201T589%202Q528%202%20496%202T461%201Q444%201%20444%2010Q444%2011%20446%2025Q448%2035%20450%2039T455%2044T464%2046T480%2047T506%2054Q523%2062%20523%2064Q522%2064%20476%20181L429%20299Q241%2095%20236%2084Q232%2076%20232%2072Q232%2053%20261%2047Q262%2047%20267%2047T273%2046Q276%2046%20277%2046T280%2045T283%2042T284%2035Q284%2026%20282%2019Q279%206%20276%204T261%201Q258%201%20243%201T201%202T142%202Q64%202%2042%200Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke- #### 2.8.2.2 连续的累积分布函数的性质

根据微积分第一基本定理有：

## 2.9 均匀分布

如果连续随机变量![X](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.98ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20852.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EX%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20d%3D%22M42%200H40Q26%200%2026%2011Q26%2015%2029%2027Q33%2041%2036%2043T55%2046Q141%2049%20190%2098Q200%20108%20306%20224T411%20342Q302%20620%20297%20625Q288%20636%20234%20637H206Q200%20643%20200%20645T202%20664Q206%20677%20212%20683H226Q260%20681%20347%20681Q380%20681%20408%20681T453%20682T473%20682Q490%20682%20490%20671Q490%20670%20488%20658Q484%20643%20481%20640T465%20637Q434%20634%20411%20620L488%20426L541%20485Q646%20598%20646%20610Q646%20628%20622%20635Q617%20635%20609%20637Q594%20637%20594%20648Q594%20650%20596%20664Q600%20677%20606%20683H618Q619%20683%20643%20683T697%20681T738%20680Q828%20680%20837%20683H845Q852%20676%20852%20672Q850%20647%20840%20637H824Q790%20636%20763%20628T722%20611T698%20593L687%20584Q687%20585%20592%20480L505%20384Q505%20383%20536%20304T601%20142T638%2056Q648%2047%20699%2046Q734%2046%20734%2037Q734%2035%20732%2023Q728%207%20725%204T711%201Q708%201%20678%201T589%202Q528%202%20496%202T461%201Q444%201%20444%2010Q444%2011%20446%2025Q448%2035%20450%2039T455%2044T464%2046T480%2047T506%2054Q523%2062%20523%2064Q522%2064%20476%20181L429%20299Q241%2095%20236%2084Q232%2076%20232%2072Q232%2053%20261%2047Q262%2047%20267%2047T273%2046Q276%2046%20277%2046T280%2045T283%2042T284%2035Q284%2026%20282%2019Q279%206%20276%204T261%201Q258%201%20243%201T201%202T142%202Q64%202%2042%200Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20strok
